definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field></block><block type="text" x="106" y="373"><field name="TEXT">Turns random blocks into lava around it, also plays breaking particles for random blocks around it and turns them into falling blocks. </field></block><block type="block_nbt_logic_set" x="74" y="453"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tagName</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></xml>
